about_the_game:
About the Game

On Call is a visual novel that invites you to work a rotation at Merritt General Hospital to learn about stress management for workers in the healthcare industry.

Key Features
During your rotation at Merritt General Hospital, you’ll encounter a diverse group of patients facing challenging ailments and disorders. Build trust and rapport with them to help them recover from their maladies. Manage your own stress while confronting these challenges or you may just crack under the pressure.

Choice Driven Narrative
Make dialogue choices to influence patient outcomes and manage your stress level as you work through your rotation. Overcome their objections to help your patients make healthy choices to improve their conditions.

Manage Stress
Build trust with your patients and use breaks to manage your stress level effectively. Don't forget to take a moment to decompress every now and then.

Patient Tracking
Utilize patient SOAP notes to track the treatment progress and decisions made for each patient. Remember to check your clipboard regularly to remain informed on each patient.

Build trust with your patients and their families to get them on the road to recovery. Manage your own stress while confronting these challenges or you may just crack under the pressure.
